title: Ranked is so annoying
body: People say I'm garbage because I had to play 200+ games to get to gold, due to me having to deal with smurfs which call me bad when they're diamond (which is another problem) and trolls on my teams, and afks, bad teammates, but I still lose lp, I swear riot needs to make a system that if you have a positive score that you only lose like 2+ lp or something honestly, all the trolls and smurfs are just unbelievable nowadays.

replies.body:
Trust me it’s not just you, I’m a support/adc main games I’am getting level 30 adcs example as yesterday got one that went 1/7 no rank yet vsing a better elo adc. I have officially given up ranked. I have been in gold 2 8 times this season as soon as I get close instant dead zone of players that have admitted in chat they brought there accounts or Smurf. 

A gold or plat account that losses lane hard 1/14  check there match history and it’s all the same just loss after loss after loss. I tried changing it up going jungle gets objectives first tower and drags still gets flamed by the team whole game...

No teamwork
People can just buy accounts ( when they clearly cannot play at the elo) 
The most toxic community I have ever seen. Even enough to get trolled on the forums if you post something. 

Is it worth your mental sanity to continue playing a game that does not invest in its players views/ideals.

I don’t need to provide evidence cause I know people also troll on the forums not mentioning one name and if you do find this thread you will still not get the satisfaction by me replying to any of your comments. 

But in the general sense I get you, people are trolls always get in promos I got a teemo jg just troll yasuo picks majority of riven always feed say gg after 2 deaths. I didn’t think someone could get to gold or higher and still have that mentality........

And not to mention the thousands of Players that speak another language during the game don’t speak English in a OCE server loose game hard in ranked it’s just no longer a competitor mode... from my experience and other league players I know in real life.

Yeah dude honestly i am just leaving ranked solo duo for a while until its better... Do flex with 5 of your friends i added you. 

Your a mate now :)

Flex isn't all that better. 
Instead of adcs being the inters/afks, its the jungles and tops.
I always get low levels trolls things and more yk its actually unfair that people can buy their accounts

this is an understatement. 
Just had my promos thrown because "afk adc meta af" and topped with afk jgs. 

Riot wont address the trolling issue because "there isnt one"
Ugh I got a trolling inting sion w ad on ranked and I said report him and he was like oh for what, He went ad and inted like why wouldn't I?

Not like it'll do anything. 
Riot just do not care. Like I said, there isn't an issue apparently despite how much you wave it into their faces and give evidence. 
If you don't see it, it can't exist right?
